name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to reliable sources, Cao Zhixin, Li Yuanjing, Zhai Dengrui, and Li Siqi, who were arrested for participating in the Liangmaqiao rally in Beijing at the end of last year, have left the detention center.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen submission
National Center for Disease Control and Prevention: We advise relevant WHO personnel not to become a tool for politicizing the origin of the new crown
As a result, the comment area was overturned, and a large number of netizens supported the WHO's origin tracing.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
A female high school student in Qinzhou City, Guangxi was molested by a physical education teacher during a physical education class. Afterwards, the school stuffed a red envelope into the girl's pocket in the hope that she would keep quiet. Later, the teacher expressed his willingness to compensate her with 130,000 yuan as a "pardon outside the law."
However, the Guangxi police said that due to insufficient evidence, they decided not to impose administrative penalties.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On April 18, the National Bureau of Statistics released data showing that the youth unemployment rate rose to 19.6% in March, the highest since August 2022.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On April 20, at the BMW Mini booth at the Shanghai Auto Show, it was suspected that staff treated foreigners and Chinese differently when distributing ice cream, which sparked widespread discussion among netizens and became a hot topic on Weibo.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: After the incident fermented, the Douyin account of the suspected party was subjected to cyberbullying

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
At the Shunde campus of Southern Medical University, a stray dog escaped to a classroom to take shelter from the rain, but was brutally killed by a security guard. This caused strong dissatisfaction among students.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to the contributor, the security guard killed the dog because he was "afraid it would bite the leader". Is the school trying to suppress the popularity of the topic? Related topics were removed from the hot search

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At the same time, some students expressed different views.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On April 20, the live broadcast room of the SpaceX Starship launch on Douyin was unable to broadcast the live footage, and the live broadcast room played "Socialism is Good" with a black screen.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Another live broadcast room is showing the panda Yaya returning to China

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Villagers from Chaxuanluo Village, Liangzhuang Town, Tai'an High-tech Zone, Shandong Province submitted a letter saying that Dong, the party branch secretary of Chaxuanluo Village, had long been violating laws and disciplines, including election fraud, fraudulently claiming relief funds for low-income households, and fraudulently claiming housing demolition subsidies. Local villagers and two village heads reported to the provincial, municipal and district levels for three years without success, and the petition reply stated that it was inconsistent with the facts. Multi-image warning Figure 1: Villagers' letter of complaint about illegal election changes

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Figure 2
Report on other violations of laws and disciplines

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Figure 3: The reply letter from the Liangzhuang Town People's Government, indicating that the issues reported were all untrue. The village committee staff directly signed the letter of acceptance and handling.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
April 20, Paris
French people's protests against Macron's pension reform plan intensified, and protesters occupied the Euronext building of the Paris Stock Exchange
